definition: any of various mostly cold-blooded aquatic vertebrates usually having scales and breathing through gills, catch or try to catch fish or shellfish
details:
noun
- any of various mostly cold-blooded aquatic vertebrates usually having scales and breathing through gills
= example: any of various mostly cold-blooded aquatic vertebrates usually having scales and breathing through gills
- the flesh of fish used as food
= example: the flesh of fish used as food
verb
- catch or try to catch fish or shellfish
= example: catch or try to catch fish or shellfish
- seek indirectly
= example: seek indirectly
= synonyms: angle
